common.action.decreaseOffsetButton: Decrease offset to so that next subtitle is at current position. Hold to decrease by 100ms.
common.action.increaseOffsetButton: Increase offset to so that previous subtitle is at current position. Hold to increase by 100ms.
common.extension.settings.openSubtitleList: Open subtitle list when loading subtitles
common.extension.videoDataSync.rememberTrackPre: Remember these track choices for this site
common.ftue.welcomeBody: Check out the <0>readme</0> to see how to get started.
common.update.heading: asbplayer just updated to version {{version}}.
common.update.alert: asbplayer updated to version {{version}}. Check out the <0>release notes</0>.
common.landing.videoElementsDetected: Load subtitles onto a video to start using asbplayer.
common.audioCaptureFailed.message: DRM-protected audio cannot be captured on the Firefox version of asbplayer.
common.settings.alwaysPlayOnSubtitleRepeat: Always play (unpause) after invoking above shortcut
common.settings.firefoxExtensionShortcutHelp: Edit this shortcut from the Plugin manager at about:addons.
